name: Bypass Capacitor
description: Images of various bypass capacitors, which are used to filter out high-frequency noise in electronic circuits.

name: Electrolytic Capacitor
description: This folder contains images of electrolytic capacitors, recognizable by their cylindrical shape and polarity markings.

name: Integrated Micro Circuit
description: A collection of images featuring different types of integrated circuits (ICs), including various form factors and pin counts.

name: LED
description: Images of Light-Emitting Diodes (LEDs), demonstrating their distinct shapes and colors.

name: PNP Transistor
description: Contains images of PNP (Positive-Negative-Positive) transistors, a type of bipolar junction transistor used for amplification and switching.

name: Armature
description: Images of armatures, a component of an electric motor or generator.

name: Attenuator
description: This directory contains images of electronic attenuators used to reduce the amplitude of a signal.

name: Cartridge Fuse
description: Images of various cartridge fuses, which are a safety device that protects an electric circuit from excessive current.

name: Clip Lead
description: Contains images of clip leads, or jumper cables, used for temporary electrical connections.

name: Electric Relay
description: Images of electric relays, which are electrically operated switches.

name: Filament
description: This folder contains images of light bulb filaments.

name: Heat Sink
description: Images of heat sinks, which are passive heat exchangers that cool electronic devices.

name: Induction Coil
description: Images of induction coils, an electrical transformer used to produce high-voltage pulses.

name: Jumper Cable
description: Contains images of jumper cables used to connect electronic components.

name: Junction Transistor
description: Images of various types of junction transistors.

name: Light Circuit
description: This directory contains images of light circuits.

name: Limiter Clipper
description: Images of electronic limiter/clipper circuits used to limit a signal's amplitude.

name: Local Oscillator
description: Images of local oscillators, an electronic circuit that generates an oscillating signal.

name: Memory Chip
description: This folder contains images of different types of memory chips.

name: Microchip
description: Images of microchips, another term for integrated circuits.

name: Microprocessor
description: Contains images of microprocessors from different manufacturers and architectures.

name: Multiplexer
description: Images of multiplexers, a device that selects one of several input signals and forwards it to a single output line.

name: Omni-Directional Antenna
description: Images of omni-directional antennas, which radiate power uniformly in all directions.

name: Potential Divider
description: This directory contains images of potential divider circuits.

name: Potentiometer
description: Images of potentiometers, a three-terminal resistor with a sliding or rotating contact that forms an adjustable voltage divider.

name: Pulse Generator
description: Images of pulse generators, a device that generates rectangular pulses.

name: Relay
description: Contains images of relays, a type of electrical switch.

name: Rheostat
description: Images of rheostats, a variable resistor used to control current.

name: Semi-Conductor
description: This folder contains images of various semiconductor components.

name: Semiconductor Diode
description: Images of semiconductor diodes, an electronic component that conducts current in only one direction.

name: Shunt
description: Images of a shunt, a device that allows electric current to pass around another point in the circuit.

name: Solenoid
description: Contains images of solenoids, a coil of wire that acts as a magnet when an electric current passes through it.
